properties.areaDesc: Charles City, VA; New Kent, VA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 8:57AM EST until February 10 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a

* Flood Warning for the Chickahominy River near Providence Forge
in...
Northeastern Charles City County in east central Virginia...
Southwestern New Kent County in east central Virginia...

* Until 900 PM EST Monday.

* At 855 AM EST, reporting gauges indicate flooding along the
Chickahominy River. The current stage is 8.1 FT. Minor Flooding is
occuring. Flood stage is 8.0 feet. Minor impacts will occur near
Providence Forge.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Holdcroft, Providence Forge, Chickahominy Shore, Sandybottom,
Mountcastle, Roaches Corner and Lanexa.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

A Flood Warning means that flooding is imminent or occurring. All
interested parties should take necessary precautions immediately.
